author: Lalita Clozel
title: Emergency Credit: Coming Soon to a Bank Near You?
text:
WASHINGTON—Consumers could find it easier to get small loans for emergency car repairs and other unplanned expenses under Trump administration plans to prod more banks to make short-term loans.
“We have a big market, we have a market that is unfulfilled,” said Comptroller of the Currency Joseph Otting in an interview. “When you don’t have an alternative in that space, what happens is people have a tendency to fall to the lowest common denominator,” such as check-cashers, pawnshops and liquor stores, he said.
